text: Skipped Parts (, ) is a film in the genre of melodrama, which premiered on September 16, 2010.Детям до 16… (2010) // Film.Ru It is the third feature film directed by Andrey Kavun after the Piranha and Kandagar.Детям до 16… // RUSKINO.RUФильм «Детям до 16»: опыт — сын ошибок трудных ==Plot== School friends Maksim, Kiril, Dasha and Leya face the changes that come with adulthood. As they begin to experience love and sex, mistakes and disappointments, betrayal and self-sacrifice, they learn to build relationships and discover something new and not always pleasant in themselves. ==Cast== * Dmitry Kubasov as Kiril * Pavel Priluchny as Maksim Лянка Грыу, Павел Прилучный и Анна Старшенбаум в фильме «Детям до 16…» * Lyanka Gryu as Darya * as Leya *Oleksiy Gorbunov as passenger ==Awards and nominations== * Russian Guild of Film Critics: Best Actress (Anna Starshenbaum) — nom * Odesa International Film Festival: Best Film; People's Choice Award — winОфициальный сайт Одесского международного кинофестиваля *: Best Actress (Anna Starshenbaum) — win == References == == External links == * * Детям до 16... on KinoPoisk Category:Films directed by Andrey Kavun Category:Russian romantic drama films Category:Russian films Category:2010 romantic drama films Category:2010 drama films
title: Skipped Parts (2010 film)
